description: Retrieve a list of the tags (keys and values) that are associated with a specified application. A tag is a label that you optionally define and associate with an application. Each tag consists of a required tag key and an optional associated tag value. A tag key is a general label that acts as a category for more specific tag values. A tag value acts as a descriptor within a tag key.

parameters.name: ResourceARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the application that you want to retrieve tag information for.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: An array that lists all the tags that are associated with the application. Each tag consists of a required tag key ( Key) and an associated tag value ( Value).
Tag keys and values are case sensitive.
For each associated resource, each tag key must be unique and it can have only one value.
The aws: prefix is reserved for use by Amazon Web Services; you can't use it in any tag keys or values that you define. In addition, you can't edit or remove tag keys or values that use this prefix.
